resources.string:
Select a mode
	•Single player
		•Find as many words as you can!
		•3,4,5,6,and 7 letter words.
	•Two-Player Mode
		•Basic Mode
			•You will get the same copy of the other player, try beating them!
		•Cutthroat Mode
			•Two players work on the same board at the same time.
	•Online Mode

Scoring
•3-letter +1pt, 4-letter +2pts, 5-letter +3pts. 6-letter +4pts, 7-letter +5pts

High Scores and Winning!
•Beat your own score or someone elseâ€™s and make it onto the high score board!\
